summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2543, for the improvement of 9th Avenue South, from Yesler Way to Washington Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, the construction of wooden curbs and gutters, planking and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 29491 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
